name: Quality Inn Airport SeaWorld Area

reviews.text: The staff where friendly & the parking free & safe but the hotel its self was terrible. The rooms where small and damp as our window didn't close properly. The location was on a busy road which meant it was noisy at night. Over all it was a very dated hoteel & I wouldn't stay there again!
reviews.title: In big need of modernising.

reviews.text: We booked through Hotwire. Because of this, Quality Inn's 100% satisfaction guarantee did not apply to our stay.
reviews.title: Ants in the room

reviews.text: Our first room had ants. We wondered how they came to be in a third floor room.
reviews.title: Good for family vacation

reviews.text: The staff offered to spray the room. We declined, not wanting insecticide permeating the room while we slept.
reviews.title: If it had a good a/c it would have been much better.

likes.liked: — The room was really nice and the bed was great.

reviews.text: The next day staff accepted our belongings and stored them until a new room was ready. We spent the day playing tourist. When we returned, our belongings were in our new room. No ants, but the refrigerator doesn't work.
reviews.title: Better experience than others

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is in a great location if ur coming to do everything we did. San Deigo Zoo, Gaslamp Quarter, Old Town San Diego, Sea World, and Tijuana.
reviews.title: Great place, close to everything

likes.liked: — the location was great!! Near everything we needed!
likes.disliked: — The parking structure was a bit tight, though much better than parking on the street. The big windows didn't open too far... prob for safety reasons.

reviews.text: We did all 5 things, and were conveniently located to all of them!
reviews.title: Don't understand what everyone has against this hotel!
Everyone please contact Better Business Bureau on these guys
reviews.text: Great customer service, comfy room, with nice bedding, and a huge window, with a view of the marina, reasonable price, reasonable breakfast, quiet hotel, underground covered parking was nice, and the hotel itself was pretty well decorated. In-hosue bar was comfortable and casual, and even allowed us to take our drinks to our room, though in plastic cups.
Internet access in lobby was nice, front desk staff was great with directions, housekeeping staff was friendly, and took are of our needs fantastically!
reviews.title: Worst Customer Service Ever

reviews.text: in-room safe for our cameras and cash and stuff.
reviews.title: Horrible customer service
Never again
reviews.text: Got this hotel off of hotwire.com for $49US/night. Room felt dirty, carpet definately needs cleaning. Felt as if bugs were crawling on us.

reviews.title: 2 Star Hotel - Safe and Clean for $60/night
reviews.text: If you don't like noise, the hotel bar has a band that plays until midnight which you can hear from room.

reviews.title: I would NEVER recommend this hotel
reviews.text: Only good thing, hotel is walking distance to restaurants.

reviews.title: Count your teeth
reviews.text: Quality Inn by Choice Hotels can be hit and miss in terms of the quality of the property. This hotel property, located right by the naval station and close to the airport is a good location if you want to be on the north side of Mission Bay.

reviews.title: satisfactory
reviews.text: This is definitely a no frills hotel - properly is quite dated and the room doors open to the outside. Bathroom was clean and the towels were thin. Internet was free as well as breakfast.

After looking at the pictures on the website we were expecting sooooo much better!!! This was the first family vacation with all 7 of us and I thought I was just going to break down and cry the moment we walked in!
reviews.title: Completely and utterly disgusting!!!

likes.disliked: — Everything (a very nasty and gross hotel) Do Not Stay HERE!

reviews.text: When we first walked in the rooms where so hot you immediately started sweating and smelly. The TV in the living room was gone and they did not know when it was going to be replaced.
reviews.title: SHOULD BE CONDEMNED!
terrible experience
reviews.text: I will list the Pros and Cons for this place:

reviews.title: The Customer is Wrong
reviews.text: Pros

reviews.title: Bed Bugs and Filth
reviews.text: -close to Sea World and downtown / Zoo

aka: Quality Inn Airport Seaworld Area Hotel
